html:
8.3.24  1:37 pm   how do you get motivation to bring a piece of music from chords melody and lyrics into an actual listenable file? the process of music production is so long and tiresome to me. especially since i have little experience and have to stop the process and search up how to do something.

      it's pretty simple. you have to want it so badly that it makes your birth feel like an unfinished event if you don't

8.3.24  12:29 pm   approximately how much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

      most of it

8.3.24  10:59 am   What are your thoughts on feelings?

      they're pretty good

8.3.24  6:58 am   is the egg come from water

      that's not the most absurd idea i've heard

8.3.24  5:20 am   can i go sleep now

      sure

8.3.24  4:33 am   I'm trying to think of a questions? How would one think of good question to ask people? Should it relate to the person's personal experience?
Though I wonder why I'm asking you even though I sorta already know the answers to my own questions.

      in that case i would suggest asking something want to know, but don't know yet. sometimes that's all it takes to make a question not seem extremely fake

8.3.24  3:31 am   if every instant noodle company in the world teamed up and made it their mission to turn the ocean into instant noodle broth by dumping all their broth packets in it, how much of a effect would it have?

      put it this way, the climate would change

8.3.24  2:51 am   what is an answer

      i'm not sure

8.3.24  2:18 am   I left my rock and got online to say "hello" to you here. Is the work going well?

      it's ok

8.3.24  1:55 am   choose one: heh, haha, lol, lmao, XD, hehe, hah, ha, lmfao.
you can also choose one not in the list

      what you didn't mention is that i can also choose multiple. i prefer the various haha/hehe combinations. i don't normally use any of your examples containing L, and i also don't use XD

8.3.24  1:15 am   Should we, as a society, collectively remove dialogue from movies, bringing about the return of the silent era of cinema?

      no

8.3.24  12:00 am   how much fun did you have today

      a little bit

8.2.24  11:27 pm   did you know you can just alternate between appending "ist" and "ic" to adjectives in order to create new, slightly different adjectives

      the way you explained it doesn't sound like it would produce the results you described, but i am fairly confident in my ability to achieve additional variation of words by manipulating suffixes

8.2.24  11:20 pm   what's your favorite idea

      thinking inside the lines

8.2.24  10:10 pm   What is your favorite frequency?

      medium

8.2.24  9:54 pm   do you ever just decide to change it up

      yes

8.2.24  9:06 pm   what's your favorite rating system

      cyclical

8.2.24  7:55 pm   Do eggs come from eggplant?

      no, the egg comes first

8.2.24  5:09 pm   is this website your contribution to the indie web or just for funsies?

      holy heck there's got to be more choices than that

8.2.24  4:07 pm   what is a question

      i have no idea

8.2.24  3:05 pm   What's your favorite sequence of letters in the alphabet?

      qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm

8.2.24  2:32 pm   I'm writing an assignment about you, and I was wondering if you might wanted to add anything?

      it's going to be impossible to add anything if i don't know exactly what's there already

8.2.24  1:45 pm   How did you make "i like to wear soft clothing" groove so hard. Like that entire song is just good

      it may have had something to do with the 9 other songs in a row i produced so quickly just before that, and i guess for that one i forgot to worry about it too much

8.2.24  10:45 am   do you think im autistic

      i have no opinion about that

8.2.24  10:34 am   To someone who doesn't yet have an intuitive sense while making music of what should go where and how it should all fall together right away, would you reccomend melody first or chords first (or doing your best to do it at the same time)?

      do you have an intuitive sense of what "should not" go where, and how it "should not" be? try doing that. i assure you, even in the highest levels of song making, this is actually still necessary to do quite often

8.2.24  9:29 am   How do I stop comparing myself to others all the time 

      you wanna go ahead and get different

8.2.24  9:29 am   do you have any tips for how to get motivated to actually do the thing you want to get done and not do other things while the thing is being done?

      you need to understand the process better. do you really know the exact process to do the thing? whenever i'm in your situation, it's tempting to assume that i do know the process (and i just "dont feel like doing it"), but then when i challenge myself to explain the actual process, it turns out i didn't actually know. then when i sort that out, suddenly every microsecond becomes breathtakingly exciting and the damn thing does itself. but i don't necessarily expect this to work for you. other people are different from me, which is one of the reasons i've stopped giving advice

8.2.24  6:26 am   What are your feelings on thoughts?

      pretty good

8.2.24  5:29 am   Are you currently awake at this hour?

      not that hour, but this hour yes

8.2.24  2:15 am   do you think some people are just naturally more artistic than others? are they happier or more sad?

      only sometimes

8.2.24  2:03 am   All of your songs seem so surrealistic. How do you translate you feeling into lyrics?

     it's not translated into lyrics, it's translated into music and words at the same time

     Do you have any sort of tips or process, or is it something you just kind of do?

     it's sort of like making it rain. you can't make it rain. you also can't stop it

8.2.24  1:24 am   what if it wasn't?

      then it wouldn't be

8.2.24  12:34 am   Do the things that you're feeling finally make sense?

      yes and no

8.1.24  11:50 pm   how do you know your songs sound good before you publish them

      i have an 'audio mode' where i can listen to the song before it comes out

8.1.24  11:17 pm   Why does time insist on moving forward all the time so fast? Why can't we slow time down when we're enjoying something or rewind time to some point in the past to experience something again or try again? Why is it always "forget the past and forget it quickly, you're in a new moment now"?

      if you're enjoying something, i don't think you want to time to slow down. i think what you want is to do the thing for more time

8.1.24  8:26 pm   How to be american?

      maybe you could make up a new way

8.1.24  8:14 pm   I memorized every country am I cool

      sort of

8.1.24  7:04 pm   How do I get better at art?

      now i'm wondering what you think good at art is or means

8.1.24  6:43 pm   when was the last time you teleported

      i don't recall

8.1.24  5:11 pm   What's your favourite day of the week?

      tuesday

8.1.24  5:02 pm   if you were hypothetically asked what your favorite hypothethical question is what would you say

      this one

8.1.24  3:57 pm   english is stupid do you agree if so tell me one reason why

      i think all natural languages are equally stupid while also being equally divine. the reason of course is that they develop as the sum total all the efforts of anyone who has ever tried to get anyone to understand what they're talking about at any given moment

8.1.24  2:06 pm   do you think a ghost will fall in love with me?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.1.24  1:28 pm   favourite hex code, aesthetically speaking?

      ff

8.1.24  1:08 pm   What do you eat for breakfast?

      lunch

8.1.24  1:07 pm   what's your favorite condiment

      pepper

8.1.24  11:27 am   if you could have any car in the world what car would it be?

      regular

8.1.24  11:27 am   is it possible to drum up something whacky?

      in a manner of speaking yes

8.1.24  9:11 am   Why does Antarctica have a lot of punishments? Clipperton Island would be better because it doesn't have humans on it.

      yeah, but then when you're writing fiction, you follow a different logic

8.1.24  8:22 am   thoughts on the eternal divine?

      if it is what it says on the tin, it will outlast the label. and of course the tin as well
